title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, a bell sound is heard. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the bell sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K.
2. Launch the SWT Example application.
3. Navigate to the Text tab in the application.
4. Click on the 'Styles: SWT.SINGLE' button.
5. Click on the 'Styles: SWT.MULTI' button.
